sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
[The primer in English.] Book of hours. English Church of England.
[8] leaves
By Rychard Grafyton dwellynge within the circuite of the late Grayfryers, prynter to the Prynces grace, [Imprynted in London : [1545?]]
Title from STC. Imprint from colophon; STC suggests publication date as 1544-1545. Based on STC 16015, a composite version--STC. Formerly STC 16031. Identified as STC 16031 on UMI microfilm. Imperfect; a fragment; 8 leaves from quires t-u only. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Title from STC. Imprint from colophon; STC suggests publication date as 1544-1545. Based on STC 16015, a composite version--STC. Formerly STC 16031. Identified as STC 16031 on UMI microfilm. Imperfect; a fragment; 8 leaves from quires t-u only. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Rychard Grafyton
the circuite of the late Grayfryers, prynter to the Prynces grace
